table.name: addresses
table.remarks: Addresses associated with various other tables/entities in the database.

column.name: address_pkey
column.remarks: The Primary Key for the addresses table.

column.name: address
column.remarks: The street address.

column.name: city
column.remarks: The city.

column.name: state
column.remarks: The state.

column.name: zipcode
column.remarks: The zipcode.

column.name: country
column.remarks: The country.

column.name: geographical_zone
column.remarks: The area in which the address is located.

table.name: availabilities
table.remarks: Presumed material availabilities.

column.name: availability_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of availabilities table.

column.name: plant
column.remarks: Primary key of plants table.

column.name: size_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of sizes table. Size of item.

column.name: supplier
column.remarks: Primary key of business_partners table; should be of type "supplier".

column.name: units_available
column.remarks: The number of units available from $SUPPLIER at $PRICE.

column.name: price
column.remarks: The price per unit of $PLANT from $SUPPLIER on $DATE.

column.name: availability_date
column.remarks: The date this information was known current.

column.name: note
column.remarks: A comment about this particular availability.

table.name: business_partner_types
table.remarks: e.g. Supplier, Customer, Truck Broker, etc.

column.name: business_partner_type_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key.

column.name: description
column.remarks: The linquistic description of the type.

table.name: business_partners
table.remarks: Customers, suppliers, companies with whom business is done.

column.name: business_partner_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of business_partners table.

column.name: business_partner_type
column.remarks: Type of partner; references business_partner_types.

column.name: business_name
column.remarks: Business name of partner.

column.name: location_address
column.remarks: Street address of partner.

column.name: billing_address
column.remarks: Billing address of partner.

column.name: primary_contact
column.remarks: The general contact information of partner.

table.name: colors
table.remarks: Contains possible ribbon colors for orders.

column.name: color_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key for colors table.

column.name: color
column.remarks: Ribbon color.

table.name: contact_detail_types
table.remarks: Type of contact detail, e.g. "phone", "email".

column.name: contact_detail_type_pkey
column.remarks: Primary Key of contact_detail_type table.

column.name: detail_type
column.remarks: Type of contact detail (in English).

table.name: contact_details
table.remarks: Contact information associated with contacts.

column.name: contact_detail_pkey
column.remarks: Primary Key of contact_details table.

column.name: contact_detail_type
column.remarks: Primary Key of contact_detail_types table.

column.name: contact
column.remarks: The contact these details are part of.

column.name: contact_detail
column.remarks: Specifics. Phone number, e-mail address, etc.

column.name: note
column.remarks: Comment about this contact info, e.g. "mobile", "business".

table.name: contacts
table.remarks: People we interact with (associated with a business partner).

column.name: business_partner
column.remarks: The business partner this contact is associated with.

column.name: first_name
column.remarks: The contact's first name.

column.name: last_name
column.remarks: The contact's last name.

column.name: note
column.remarks: Any comments about the contact, e.g. "field", "office".

table.name: customer_order_lineitem_statuses
table.remarks: Lists the possible status flags for a line item in an order.

column.name: customer_order_lineitem_status_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of customer_order_lineitem_statuses table.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Text description of the line item status.

table.name: customer_order_lineitems
table.remarks: Contains the line-items for orders.

column.name: customer_order
column.remarks: References the order the line-item is associated with.

column.name: status
column.remarks: References the status of the line-item.

column.name: substitute
column.remarks: If status==substituted, then a reference to substitute lineitem. elseif NOT NULL, a reference to the item this is substituting for.

column.name: plant
column.remarks: The plant being ordered.

column.name: size_pkey
column.remarks: The size of the item being ordered.

column.name: units_ordered
column.remarks: The quantity of this item being ordered.

column.name: price
column.remarks: The price to use (what the supplier is charging).

column.name: contribution
column.remarks: The contribution to us. contribution+price = price to customer.

column.name: available_date
column.remarks: The date at which the item is available for us to pick up.

column.name: purchase_order
column.remarks: The (current) purchase order we issued on which this item can be found.

column.name: shipping_load
column.remarks: The shipping load on which this item went out.

column.name: public_note
column.remarks: A comment (visible on reports which go to the customer).

column.name: private_note
column.remarks: A comment (not visible on reports which go to the customer).

column.name: sort_order
column.remarks: A column on which to sort. A customer submits a randomly ordered list. This helps retain that ordering so the customer isn't confused when they see the line-item bill.

table.name: customer_order_statuses
table.remarks: Descriptions of each order status.

column.name: customer_order_status_pkey
column.remarks: Primary Key of customer_order_statuses table.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Order status (in English).

table.name: customer_orders
table.remarks: Listing of orders our customers have placed with us.

column.name: customer_order_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of customer_orders table.

column.name: customer_order_status
column.remarks: Primery key of customer_order_statuses table. Current status of order.

column.name: color
column.remarks: Ribbon color associated with order. Items be tagged with this color.

column.name: customer
column.remarks: Primary key of business_partners table. This customer ordered this order.

column.name: order_date
column.remarks: The order was placed on this date.

column.name: customer_job_address
column.remarks: Where the customer will be using the material.

column.name: customer_job_name
column.remarks: The customer's job reference name.

column.name: delivery_address
column.remarks: The address to deliver the order to.

column.name: delivery_date
column.remarks: The date and/or time at which to deliver the order.

column.name: fulfillment_zone
column.remarks: The zone in which the order will be filled; where the suppliers are.

column.name: destination_zone
column.remarks: The zone to which the order will be shipped; where the customer wants it.

table.name: geographical_zones
table.remarks: Specifies categories into which business partners can be grouped.

column.name: geographical_zone_pkey
column.remarks: Primary Key of geographical_zones table.

column.name: zone
column.remarks: The description of the zone.

table.name: inqueries
table.remarks: Material inqueries we've sent to our suppliers.

column.name: inquery_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of inqueries table.

column.name: creation_date
column.remarks: Date inquery was created.

column.name: inquery_message
column.remarks: Message to show on inquery.

column.name: inquery_issued
column.remarks: True if inquery has been sent to suppliers.

table.name: inquery_lineitems
table.remarks: Lineitem components of inqueries.

column.name: inquery_lineitem_pkey
column.remarks: The inquery this lineitem belongs to.

column.name: plant
column.remarks: The material being inquired about.

column.name: size_pkey
column.remarks: The size of the material.

column.name: units_available
column.remarks: How many are being inquired about?

column.name: customer_order_lineitem
column.remarks: A customer order lineitem upon which this inquery is based.

column.name: note
column.remarks: A note about this lineitem.

table.name: inquery_messages
table.remarks: Messages that can be applied to outgoing inqueries.

column.name: message
column.remarks: Text message to use.

table.name: invoice_lineitems
table.remarks: Lineitems for the invoices.

column.name: invoice_lineitem_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of invoice_lineitems table.

column.name: invoice
column.remarks: The invoice this lineitem belongs to.

column.name: customer_order_lineitem
column.remarks: The customer order lineitem being invoiced.

table.name: invoice_statuses
table.remarks: Possible statuses for invoices.

column.name: invoice_status_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of invoice_statuses table.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Text description of status.

table.name: invoices
table.remarks: Invoices that we've issued to our customers.

column.name: invoice_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of invoices table.

column.name: customer_order
column.remarks: Reference to customer order being invoiced.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Current status of invoice.

column.name: issue_date
column.remarks: The date on which the invoice was issued.

column.name: tag
column.remarks: Helps identify an invoice to a customer; e.g. "ORDER/TAG".

table.name: pickup_list_lineitem_statuses
table.remarks: The possible status flags for a lineitem in a pickup list.

column.name: pickup_list_lineitem_status_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Text description of this status.

table.name: pickup_list_lineitems
table.remarks: Lineitems for pickup lists.

column.name: pickup_list_lineitem_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of pickup_list_lineitems table.

column.name: pickup_list
column.remarks: The pickup list this lineitem is on.

column.name: customer_order_lineitem
column.remarks: The customer order lineitem to pickup.

table.name: pickup_lists
table.remarks: A list of items to go out and retrieve from suppliers.

column.name: pickup_date
column.remarks: The date to pick this stuff up.

table.name: plants
table.remarks: Contains a listing of all the plants we know about.

column.name: plant_pkey
column.remarks: The Primary Key for the plants table.

column.name: botanical_name
column.remarks: The botanical name of the plant.

column.name: common_name
column.remarks: The common name of the plant.

table.name: purchase_order_lineitem_statuses
table.remarks: Lists the possible status flags for a line item in an order.

column.name: purchase_order_lineitem_status_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of purchase_order_lineitem_statuses table.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Text description of the line item status.

table.name: purchase_order_lineitems
table.remarks: Line-item listings of what material is in the POs we issue.

column.name: purchase_order
column.remarks: Reference to the PO.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Current status of this line-item.

column.name: customer_order_lineitem
column.remarks: Reference to the customer_order_lineitem this purchase_order_lineitem is for.

column.name: plant
column.remarks: Reference to what kind of material is being ordered.

column.name: size_pkey
column.remarks: Size of plant being ordered.

column.name: unit_price
column.remarks: Price per unit of plant.

column.name: units_ordered
column.remarks: The number of units being ordered.

column.name: note
column.remarks: A brief comment about this line item.

table.name: purchase_order_statuses
table.remarks: Lists the possible status flags for purchase order.

column.name: purchase_order_status_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of purchase_order_statuses table.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Text description of the purchase order status.

table.name: purchase_orders
table.remarks: Contains a listing of purchase orders we have issued to our suppliers.

column.name: purchase_order_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of purchase_orders table.

column.name: customer_order
column.remarks: Reference to the customer order this PO is related to.

column.name: supplier
column.remarks: Reference to the supplier this PO is being sent to.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Reference to the current status of this PO.

column.name: issue_date
column.remarks: The date the PO was issued.

column.name: paid_date
column.remarks: The date we paid for the material in the PO.

table.name: shipping_load_statuses
table.remarks: Defines the possible states of a shipping load.

column.name: shipping_load_status_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of shipping_load_statuses table.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Text description of the state or status.

table.name: shipping_loads
table.remarks: A listing of shipping "loads" on which material may be shipped.

column.name: shipping_load_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of shipping_loads table.

column.name: status
column.remarks: The current status of this shipping load.

column.name: carrier
column.remarks: The carrier carrying this load.

column.name: broker
column.remarks: The broker through which the carrier was obtained.

column.name: note
column.remarks: A brief comment about this shipping load.

table.name: shipping_stop_lineitems
table.remarks: Items affected by a stop.

column.name: shipping_stop_lineitem_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key.

column.name: item
column.remarks: Item from customer order that is affected.

table.name: shipping_stop_types
table.remarks: Defines the kinds of shipping stops.

column.name: shipping_stop_type_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key of shipping_stop_types table.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Written description of the type of stop.

table.name: shipping_stops
table.remarks: Listing of all the stops for each load.

column.name: shipping_stop_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key for shipping_stops table.

column.name: shipping_load
column.remarks: The load this pick is a part of.

column.name: sort_order
column.remarks: Provides ordering capability for picks.

table.name: size_classes
table.remarks: Contains size classifications for materials.

column.name: size_class_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key for size_classes table.

column.name: size_class
column.remarks: Size classification (in English).

table.name: sizes
table.remarks: Defines the specific sizes.

column.name: size_pkey
column.remarks: Primary key for sizes table.

column.name: size_class
column.remarks: Reference to size_class.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Size (in English).
